price: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, kun san waɗanda suka ƙẽtare haddi daga gare ku a cikin Asabar, sai muka ce musu: "ku kasance birai ƙasƙantattu."
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱعۡتَدَوۡاْ مِنكُمۡ فِي ٱلسَّبۡتِ فَقُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُواْ قِرَدَةً خَٰسِـِٔينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'tumu alladhīna iʿ'tadaw minkum fī al-sabti faqul'nā lahum kūnū qiradatan khāsiīna
